meanings.definition: The underside of a building component, such as an arch or overhanging eave.
meanings.sent1: The soffits of the arch were beautifully painted in bright colors.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter installed the soffits under the overhanging eave of the roof.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid acorns in the soffits of the arch, thinking they were secret compartments.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the soffits of the arch glowed like a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The soffits of the arch creaked in the wind, adding an eerie atmosphere to the old building.

meanings.definition: The exposed surface beneath the overhanging section of a roof.
meanings.sent1: The soffits of the roof were made of white vinyl for easy maintenance.
meanings.sent2: Birds often build nests in the soffits under the overhanging section of the roof.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat liked to nap on the warm soffits of the roof, pretending to be a gargoyle.
meanings.sent4: During the rainstorm, water dripped from the soffits of the roof like a leaky faucet.
meanings.sent5: The soffits of the roof provided shade for the window below, keeping the room cool in the summer.
